69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:04): Moridin8: their fucking Base bulk uploads are broken and I just wasted my weekend updating our tech to spit out correct feeds
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:04): at computation time of 90 minutes per feed
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): I had to compute, recompute, compute against the original, verify
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): then wait for their shit to work... except it doesn't
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): and they haven't responded to my emails from last week
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): Moridin8: first they told me I had 12,000 acceptable products, but I could only use 10,000 - even though the limit was 100,000
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): then they told me that the size limit wasn't actually 20mb like they said, but 10
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): and to mail them for an increase
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): (which, I did)
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:05): but now their FTP isn't reading my 5mb files
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:06): then they marked my feed disapproved, and refuse to read any more uploads
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:06): and it's disapproved because they didn't take my fixed feed
69e2e9b6faa43ce63a2ecee941ecc641 (02:06): and they didn't take my fixed feed... I have no idea why actually

f676d6f993d218c809593f02705afc80 (02:11): minux: You have an app that needs to connect to a server. It doesn't need to parse a website, you have control over the server. However, it needs to get something from the server that from some reason it can't get there.
